summary: Texas is the second largest state in the United States.
full_text:
Floydada is a city in and the county seat of Floyd County, Texas, United States. This rural community lies on the high plains of the Llano Estacado in West Texas and is sometimes referred to as the Pumpkin Capital of Texas. The population was 3,676 at the 2000 census.
^ a b "Floydada". Geographic Names Information System. United States Geological Survey. 
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07. 
^ Floydada Chamber of Commerce. "Punkin Days ". Welcome to Floydada, Texas. Retrieved January 27, 2015.
title: Floydada, Texas
